credit_check.msg_warning_login: By continuing you will be redirected to your bank provider to allow access to your credit score
credit_check.msg_permission_access: We need permission to access the Credit Score at the %s bank. Doing so, helps us to perform the preliminary assesment of your eligibiliity.
credit_check.msg_credit_checking: Your credit check is processing, please wait until we recieve the information from your bank.
credit_check.msg_low_score:
Sorry, your Credit Score is too low to continue.
Please contact your bank to
find out how to increase your Credit Score.
credit_check.msg_good_score:
Congratulations!, you have a good Credit Score.
Please “Continue” to fill in the loan application.
